Wisdom: إِيَّاكَ وَالْمَلَقَ فَإِنَّ الْمَلَقَ لَيْسَ مِنْ خَلَائِقِ الْإِيمَانِ
enWisdom: Beware of flattery, for indeed flattery is not from the characteristics of faith [and the faithful]
Many a [show of ostentation and] vainglory brings about loss
You must acquire knowledge, for indeed it is an honourable heritage
Flattery is not part of the character of Prophets

Wisdom: مَنْ كَثُرَ مَلَقُهُ لَمْ يُعْرَفْ بِشْرُهُ
enWisdom: One whose flattery increases, his [sincere] joyfulness is not recognized
